pages.content:
[HEADING] Master of Science in Business Analytics
[HEADING] Ranked No. 1 in the World for Return on Investment
[HEADING] The UC Davis Difference
[HEADING] Industry-Relevant Training
[HEADING] Comprehensive Skill Development
[HEADING] Diverse Skill Set
[HEADING] Hands-On Experience
[HEADING] Teamwork and Collaboration
[HEADING] Collaborative, Hands-on Business Analytics Project
[HEADING] "I chose the UC Davis MSBA program because of its rigorous curriculum, direct access to world-class faculty and industry experts, and the opportunity to network in the Silicon Valley and Bay Area."
One Year STEM-Designated Program         Convenient Classes in San Francisco       August 2025 Start
Our program uniquely prepares you to meet the growing demand for managerial talent in analytics.
Gain expertise in both data science and business, blending technical skills with organizational acumen.
We value and cultivate a diverse range of abilities, bringing together teams with strengths in quantitative analysis, computing, business experience and organizational effectiveness.
Engage in a one-year analytics practicum project with a corporate sponsor and faculty advisors. This project is integrated into your studies and covers everything from opportunity identification to problem-solving, client persuasion, and implementation.
Experience the power of teamwork as you collaborate on real-world projects, learning-by-doing in a dynamic and supportive environment.
UC Davis MSBA strategic projects bring company partners together with student teams and a faculty advisor. In the one-year course, you solve complex data analytics problems and present recommendations to the client company.
Previous Practicum Projects
Ana Parra Vera MSBA 20
Data Analyst
Cisco
• Angel Flight West
• Autodesk
• CBRE/McKesson
• ChargePoint
• Charles Schwab Corporation

Hands-On Experience

Teamwork and Collaboration
Experience the power of teamwork as you collaborate on real-world projects, learning-by-doing in a dynamic and supportive environment.

Master of Professional Accountancy
Rolling Admissions
We accept applications to the Online MBA program on a rolling basis. Cohorts start in January, April, June and September.
Rolling Admissions
We accept applications to the Online Master of Management program on a rolling basis. Cohorts start in April and September.

pages.title: Application Management

pages.content:
[HEADING] Connect with Us!
[HEADING] Related content
There are countless benefits to earning a graduate degree at UC Davis Graduate School of Management. Our innovative degree offerings include MBA, MM, MSBA and MPAc. From moving up the career ladder, to gaining the skills you need to switch fields or start your own business, your Graduate School of Management degree opens many new professional doors for you.
Come connect with an admissions representative who will answer all your questions about our world-class curriculum, our global alumni network and more. Application fee waiver codes are available!
Top 20 Public MBA—quintessential college town in Northern California
Top 20 Public Part-Time MBA—45 minutes from Silicon Valley in San Ramon
No. 1 MBA in Sacramento region
Top 10 Ranked Online MBA in North America, 13th Globally
STEM-Designated: Unlock tech-driven accounting skills to excel your career
No. 1 Worldwide for Return on Investment
9-month full-time program at the UC Davis campus
15-Month part-time program offered 100% online
• November 05, 2025 11:00am - 2:00pm
[GRID_TABLE]
November 05, 2025 11:00am - 2:00pm

pages.content:
[HEADING] Connect with Us!
[HEADING] Why a UC Davis GSM degree?
[HEADING] Related content
There are countless benefits to earning a UC Davis Graduate business management degree. From moving up the career ladder, to gaining the skills you need to switch fields or start your own business, a GSM degree opens many new professional doors for you. An admissions representative will answer all your questions about our world-class curriculum, our global alumni network and more. Ask about our scholarship and financing options too!
Our programs are offered at the UC Davis campus, the San Francisco Bay Area—the world’s foremost hub of innovation, in Sacramento—California’s thriving state capital, and the University of California's first online MBA.
Top 20 Public MBA—quintessential college town in Northern California
Top 20 Public Part-Time MBA—45 minutes from Silicon Valley in San Ramon

[HEADING] Why a UC Davis GSM degree?
[HEADING] Related content
There are countless benefits to earning a UC Davis Graduate business management degree. From moving up the career ladder, to gaining the skills you need to switch fields or start your own business, a GSM degree opens many new professional doors for you. An admissions representative will answer all your questions about our world-class curriculum, our global alumni network and more. Ask about our scholarship and financing options too!
Our programs are offered at the UC Davis campus, the San Francisco Bay Area—the world’s foremost hub of innovation, in Sacramento—California’s thriving state capital, and the University of California's first online MBA.
Top 20 Public MBA—quintessential college town in Northern California
Top 20 Public Part-Time MBA—45 minutes from Silicon Valley in San Ramon
No. 1 MBA in Sacramento region
Top 10 Ranked Online MBA in North America, 13th Globally
STEM-Designated: Unlock tech-driven accounting skills to excel your career
No. 1 Worldwide for Return on Investment
9-month full-time program at the UC Davis campus
15-Month part-time program offered 100% online

pages.title: HireUC Alumni Career Summit | UC Davis Graduate School of Management

pages.content:
[HEADING] Collaborate for impact
Our nationally and internationally recognized graduate business programs are focused on preparing the next generation of inspired, innovative and collaborative leaders who are committed to making a positive impact. Our four campuses span Northern California’s economic megaregion—and virtually with the first University of California Online MBA program.
All eight of our programs are STEM-designated,  reflecting the rigorous curriculum that emphasizes quantitative analysis and data-driven decision making. We invite you to learn more to find the program that best fits your personal and professional goals.
